name: Gakkou o Tsukurou!! Kouchou Sensei Monogatari
overview: The Gakkou o Tsukurou series places the player in the principal of a school, placing him in charge of management and renovating the school grounds. The player decides everything: The place and the new buildings, the professors, the new places of the school, etc. In this sequel the game features new features like walking around the school that the player made with the director character that you choose in a beatiful ismetric 2d view, and they player can talk with all the professors and students to know what they think or needs. There are other new features like the heart that improves with every good decission that the player made or the promotion of the professor or students.
